com.xebialabs.overthere
Class ConnectionOptions

java.lang.Object
  com.xebialabs.overthere.ConnectionOptions

public class ConnectionOptions
extends java.lang.Object

Represents options to use when creating a connection.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String ADDRESS
          Common connection option that specifies the address to connect to.
static java.lang.String CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_MILLIS
          Connection option (Integer) for all protocol that specifies the connection timeout in milliseconds to use.

          Default value (120000) for the connection option that specifies the connection timeout in milliseconds to use.

Field Detail

OPERATING_SYSTEM

public static final java.lang.String OPERATING_SYSTEM
Connection option for all protocols that specifies the operating system to connect to. This is used to determine how to encode paths and commands and to determine the default temporary directory path.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_PATH

public static final java.lang.String TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_PATH
Connection option for most protocols that specifies the directory in which the connection-scope temporary directory is created. Any OverthereConnection.getTempFile(String) temporary file created, will be created in this directory.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_DELETE_ON_DISCONNECT

public static final java.lang.String TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_DELETE_ON_DISCONNECT
Connection option (Boolean) for most protocols that specifies whether to delete the connection-scope temporary directory when the connection is closed.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DEFAULT_TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_DELETE_ON_DISCONNECT

public static final boolean DEFAULT_TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_DELETE_ON_DISCONNECT
Default value (true) for the connection option that specifies whether to delete the connection-scope temporary directory when the connection is closed.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TEMPORARY_FILE_CREATION_RETRIES

public static final java.lang.String TEMPORARY_FILE_CREATION_RETRIES
Connection option (int) for most protocol that specifies how many times to retry creating a unique temporary file name before giving up.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DEFAULT_TEMPORARY_FILE_CREATION_RETRIES

public static final int DEFAULT_TEMPORARY_FILE_CREATION_RETRIES
Defalut value (100) for connection option that specifies how many times to retry creating a unique temporary file name before giving up.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_MILLIS

public static final java.lang.String CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_MILLIS
Connection option (Integer) for all protocol that specifies the connection timeout in milliseconds to use.

See Also:

getOptional

public <T> T getOptional(java.lang.String key)
Retrieves the value of an optional connection option.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the connection option.
Parameters:
key - the key of the connection option.
Returns:

get

public <T> T get(java.lang.String key,
                 T defaultValue)
Retrieves the value of a connection option or a default value if that option has not been set.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the connection option.
Parameters:
key - the key of the connection option.
defaultValue - the default value to use of the connection options has not been set.
Returns:
the value of the connection option or the default value if that option was not specified.
